statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (14,-8) and (12,-11).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{-{11}-{\left(-{8}\right)}}}{{{12}-{\left({14}\right)}}}=-\frac{{3}}{{-{{2}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle\frac{{3}}{{2}} (if it's not already reduced)
